7852.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"daqa8","text":"Measure 950 mL dH2O into a 1 L glass bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":17,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"986s1","text":"Filter sterilize final vitamin solution through a 0.2 micron PES membrane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4u5g8","text":"Increase or decrease amount proportionally to prepare stock quantities as needed. Add dry reagents slowly to allow for dissolution in between each addition. Solutions will be prepared and autoclaved separately, except for carbon and vitamins which are filter sterilized through 0.2 micron PES membranes. Each autoclaved solution should be cooled completely before combining - remember to autoclave extra bottles or graduated cylinders as needed for measuring and mixing. The carbon source should only be added after autoclaved solutions have cooled; it is filter sterilized into the medium and can be added during mixing or at any time before setting up a culture. Extra solutions can be stored frozen or at 4 Celsius. This recipe is for preparing 1 L of liquid medium, but plates can be made as well with slight variation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and itâ€™s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c66cg","text":"Add 20 g Sigma Sea Salts into a 1 L glass bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qejt","text":"Add 699 mL dH2O to sea salts in bottle and mix well to dissolve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7e0l0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9i0to","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6btkq","text":"Add a stir bar to bottle if needed to mix and dissolve salts.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"76lth","text":"Remember if adding Bacto Agar that this will not dissolve until solution is autoclaved.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f09is","text":"Set prepared sea salt solution aside until ready to autoclave.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eev4m","text":"Add 50 mg FeEDTA into a 250 mL glass bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmhhh","text":"Add 100 mL dH2O to FeEDTA in bottle and mix well to dissolve (stock concentration is 1.36 mM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6n81g","text":"Filter-sterilize FeEDTA solution using a 0.2 micron PES membrane filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epu8f","text":"Add 150 mL of 1 M Tris HCl, pH 7.5, into a 1 L glass bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqqgf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"921lp","text":"Accurate pH is very important!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7i3st","text":"Add 0.34 g NH4Cl into the same bottle and dissolve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18hb4","text":"Add 182.98 mg K2HPO4 into the same bottle and dissolve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":15,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":19,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77fhm","text":"Add 375 mL dH2O to the same bottle and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ctjh","text":"Set prepared basal medium aside until ready to autoclave.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1stg1","text":"Autoclave sea salt solution and basal medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdts8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"62qjf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8p38i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"drtnb","text":"Remember to throw in extra bottles and/or graduated cylinders if needed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dl8vd","text":"Don't forget to loosen the lids before and tighten the lids after!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bu9","text":"Do not combine solutions before autoclaving.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drm3","text":"Add 50 mL of FeEDTA stock to the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8fll","text":"Add 250 mL basal medium to the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7q28","text":"Add 1 mL of vitamin supplement the the bottle of sea salt solution and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"chfj5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":7852,"title":"MBM Vitamin Supplement","title_html":"MBM Vitamin Supplement","load_collapsed":false,"uri":"mbm-vitamin-supplement-jwkcpcw","image":{"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/nqfdajw.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/pr-journal/nqfdajw.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"Christa Smith","affiliation":"University of Georgia","affiliation_url":"http://www.marsci.uga.edu/","username":"christa-smith","link":"","image":{"source":"/img/avatars/013.png","placeholder":"/img/avatars/013.png","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":13},"type_id":1,"guid":"8A59D77CB9DA11E99CA40242AC110005"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqt3d","text":"Store prepared medium at 4 Celsius.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rfbd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2uqka","text":"Prepared medium can be filtered (0.2 micron PES membrane) if needed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40t3a","text":"A carbon source can be added to the finished minimal medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1quo7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"lgad","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"27tgf","text":"Carbon source (type and concentration) can be varied as needed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f64ft","text":"Carbon source stock solution should be filter-sterilized through a 0.2 micron PES membrane filter and stored frozen until needed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: Minimal Basal Medium (liquid)
